meanings.definition: A cell that undergoes meiosis to form sperm cells.
meanings.sent1: Spermatocytes divide to create sperm cells.
meanings.sent2: The spermatocytes in the testes develop into mature sperm.
meanings.sent3: The spermatocytes in the lab seem to be working overtime!
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work was like that of spermatocytes dividing tirelessly.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the spermatocytes appeared like busy factories producing sperm.

meanings.definition: A type of cell found in the testes.
meanings.sent1: The spermatocytes play a crucial role in sperm production.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying the function of spermatocytes in the testes.
meanings.sent3: The spermatocytes in the testes must be having a party!
meanings.sent4: In the sea of testicular cells, spermatocytes stood out like stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The health of the spermatocytes directly impacts fertility in males.
